product_name: The North Face Back-To-Berkeley 84 Boots - Men's
long_description: Throwback stying makes the waterproof Back-To-Berkeley 84 boot by The North Face a classic for walking around campus or taking a day hike in wet, cool weather. Waterproof HydroSeal(R) membranes in the suede uppers and gusseted tongues keep wet weather out for great comfort. Durable metal lace hardware adds a classic rugged look. Washable OrthoLite(R) foam insoles enhance comfort. Lightweight, die-cut EVA midsoles supply cushioning and shock absorption for all-day wear. The North Face Back-To-Berkeley 84 boots have durable Winter Grip(R) rubber outsoles for tenacious traction in wet, slick conditions. Temperature-sensitive Ice Pick(TM) rubber lugs on outsoles harden when temps fall below freezing, providing extra bite into the terrain.
short_description: Throwback stying makes the waterproof Back-To-Berkeley 84 boot by The North Face a classic for walking around campus or taking a day hike in wet, cool weather.
